thread.title: Kim Kardashian Spoke About Her Robbery For The First Time, And People Got Emotional
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Spoke About Her Robbery For The First Time, And People Got Emotional

author: Tahlia Pritchard
title: Kim Kardashian Spoke About Her Robbery For The First Time, And People Got Emotional
text:
She was tied up on the bed, with her mouth duct-taped. Assuming the perpetrators would kill her, Kim said she “prayed Kourtney could lead a normal life after she sees my dead body on the bed”. ID: 10728560 3. Needless to say, it made for highly distressing and emotional viewing for fans. Kanye to Kim: " If they would've done something to you, I wouldn't have stopped until they was dead." #kuwtk Me:
— Elle Dorval (@elledorval) ID: 10728568 Listening to Kim's recollection of the robbery 😭😭 #KUWTK
— Robert Vasquez 👑 (@MrDirector911) ID: 10728572 I have a new found respect for Kim after #kuwtk tonight! I can't imagine going through something as horrific as she did!
— Maiya (@itsMaiMai801) ID: 10728581 Never thought I would cry during an episode of @KUWTK but here we are #kuwtk
— Halle Zielinski (@HalHallz) ID: 10728596 7. The show featured footage of Kim reuniting with her kids after the robbery, putting on a brave face so they didn’t think “anything was wrong”. That emotional moment when Kim reunites with her kids after Paris 😭 #KUWTK
— אסתר (@_itsjustesther) ID: 10728574 8. Fans also started a hashtag, tweeting #HereForKim to show their support. #HereForKim my strong woman
— 🍣 (@anhlovatic) ID: 10728585 My sunshine #HereForKim
— ㅤㅤㅤㅤ (@TheWifeOfPablo) ID: 10728587 Kim you told just enough of the truth, thank you for sharing your story with us. So many owe you an apology. ❤🙏🏽 to you #HereForKim #kuwtk
— Misz Goody2Shoes (@MiszG00dy2Shoes) ID: 10728591 @KimKardashian you are one of the strongest and bravest people I know of! We will always be here to support you #HereForKim! ❤
— Ciará Kardashian (@CiaraKardashx) ID: 10728592 12. Kim also took to Twitter to share some thoughts after the episode. I took a tragic horrific experience and did not let it diminish me, rather grew and evolved and allowed the experience to teach me.
— Kim Kardashian West (@KimKardashian) ID: 10728598 I can say I've become so much better because of it....thank you for allowing me to share my story tonight #KUWTK
— Kim Kardashian West (@KimKardashian) ID: 10728599 14. We love you, Kim. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10728600 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
  More News About Kim Kardashian Tahlia Pritchard is a senior writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
